item.title: Mission impossible 1
item.description: Event Challenge Category Points Solves santhacklausctf mi1 Forensic/Crypto 800 18 TL;DR After downloading the zip file we were faced with a linux memory dump. After building the correct profile for volatility you had to perform a known plain text attack on an encrypted and splited zip file to recover the file flag.txt. Introduction After downloading the file MI1.zip we had a memdump.
